price: Walang iba ang bawat isa kundi lahat sa harap Namin mga padadaluhin [para hatulan].
arabic: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-in kullun lammā jamīʿun ladaynā muḥ'ḍarūna
